message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm definitely interested, but $7,500 is a bit higher than I'd like to go right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $7,000?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,250. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
